docs.snippet: A mother has sued a Pennsylvania school district for a delay in telling parents that the water at her daughter's school was contaminated with toxic levels of lead, according to a complaint filed in U.S. federal court on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A mother has sued a Pennsylvania school district for a delay in telling parents that the water at her daughter's school was contaminated with toxic levels of lead, according to a complaint filed in U.S. federal court on Wednesday.

headline.main: Mother Sues Pennsylvania School District Over Lead-Tainted Water
headline.print_headline: Mother Sues Pennsylvania School District Over Lead-Tainted Water

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Theresa May won approval from parliament's lower chamber on Wednesday to trigger Britain's exit from the European Union, defeating attempts by pro-EU lawmakers to attach extra conditions to her plan to start divorce talks by March 3...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Theresa May won approval from parliament's lower chamber on Wednesday to trigger Britain's exit from the European Union, defeating attempts by pro-EU lawmakers to attach extra conditions to her plan to start divorce talks by March 31.

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court will not act until at least the fall on a major business dispute on whether companies can head off costly class action lawsuits, meaning President Donald Trump's nominee to the bench will almost certainly be in place to cast...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court will not act until at least the fall on a major business dispute on whether companies can head off costly class action lawsuits, meaning President Donald Trump's nominee to the bench will almost certainly be in place to cast a possible pivotal vote.

headline.main: U.S. Supreme Court Puts Off Action on Major Class Action Dispute
headline.print_headline: U.S. Supreme Court Puts Off Action on Major Class Action Dispute
